scripts.env:setup: bash -c 'ENV_HASH=$(node -e "console.log(require(\"crypto\").randomBytes(32).toString(\"hex\"))"); cp .env.example .env; if [[ "$OSTYPE" == "darwin"* ]]; then sed -i "" "s/^NEXTAUTH_SECRET=.*/NEXTAUTH_SECRET=${ENV_HASH}/" .env; else sed -i "s/^NEXTAUTH_SECRET=.*/NEXTAUTH_SECRET=${ENV_HASH}/" .env; fi'
scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm env:setup && pnpm build:native && mkdir -p data && pnpm db:push && pnpm db:seed
scripts.build:native: cd node_modules/.pnpm/better-sqlite3@12.6.2/node_modules/better-sqlite3 && npm run build-release && cd ../../../canvas@3.2.1/node_modules/canvas && npm run install
scripts.postinstall: pnpm build:native || echo 'Warning: Failed to build native modules. Run: pnpm build:native'
scripts.db:reset: rm -f data/library.db data/library.db-shm data/library.db-wal && pnpm db:push && pnpm db:seed
